1370: Esa was born in Uterechse straet in 1370.
Got married to Dammas at age 25 in 1370.
Gave birth to Dybben in 1370 at age 25.
1385: Died while giving birth to Sylof in 1385 at age 40.
1371: Gave birth to Aue in 1371 at age 26.
1376: Gave birth to Bernardus in 1376 at age 31.
1378: Gave birth to Ymmekine in 1378 at age 33.
1380: Gave birth to Sywi in 1380 at age 35.

1382: Gave birth to Emmelina in 1382 at age 37.
